item.title: Systems Professional Resources
item.description:
The Systems Professionals Committee of the SIGHPC Education Chapter had assembled a list of training resources for systems professionals. In the the future, we also expect to include reviews of the materials. Please provide additional information for this resource listing.

  • Linux Cluster Institute
  • Oklahoma University Virtual Residency Introductory/Intermediate Workshops
  • Los Alamos National Laboratory Information Science and Technology Institute ISTI

item.title: Undergraduate Internship and Research Opportunities
item.description:
We’ve assembled a list of undergraduate opportunities we’re aware of in HPC, computational science, or data science. This list is certainly not complete, so if you know of additional opportunities, please email us at chair at sighpcedu dot com and we’ll add it here!

Location: Los Alamos, NM

Eligibility: US citizens.
Applications Due: January 7, 2025.

Location: Los Alamos, NM
